attributes.action: Save Causeway Hospital Accident and Emergency
attributes.additional_details: This petition has been commissioned to highlight the importance of our local accident and emergency department to its people. Save Causeway Hospital's A & E department from closing by signing this petition! We want it kept open 24/7. This is imperatively important! The nearest A & E department from Causeway is an hour's drive. Lives WILL be lost unnecessarily if the closure goes ahead!
